column4: I have to download the installer and then translate it to a .deb
search on ubuntuforums.org - there are a few threads that give you a five step method to do it, which works really nicely
I got the win32codecs from multiverse, and they're not free
when did you get the win32 codecs?  I think they've been taken out of the repositories as well, certainly were a week ago when i reinstalled kubuntu
